Online gradient descent

Like (offline) gradient descent but instead of ff, we use fif_i, iâˆˆ1,â€¦,Ti \in 1,â€¦,T

ğ±*=argminğ±fi(ğ±)\mathbf{x}^* = \arg \min_{\mathbf{x}} f_i(\mathbf{x}) (the offline optimum)

Assume:

  • f1,.,,fTf_1,.,,f_T are all convex
  • Each is G-Lipschitz: for all ğ±\mathbf{x}, ii, ||âˆ‡fi(ğ±)||2â‰¤G||\nabla f_i(\mathbf{x})||_2 \leq G
  • starting radius: ||ğ±*âˆ’ğ±(1)||2â‰¤R||\mathbf{x}^{*}-\mathbf{x}^{(1)}||_2 \leq R

Online Gradient descent:

  • Choose ğ±(1)\mathbf{x}^{(1)} and Î·=RGT\eta = \frac{R}{G \sqrt{T}}.
  • For i=0,â€¦,Ti=0,â€¦,T:
    • Play ğ±(i)\mathbf{x}^{(i)}
    • Observe fif_i and incur cost fi(ğ±(i))f_i(\mathbf{x}^{(i)})
    • ğ±(i+1)=ğ±(i)âˆ’Î·âˆ‡fi(ğ±(i))\mathbf{x}^{(i+1)}=\mathbf{x}^{(i)}-\eta \nabla f_i(\mathbf{x}^{(i)})
